title: Peasant Interior
credit_line: Gift of Miss Lois E. Scaife, in memory of Marvin F. Scaife
provenance_text:
Lois E. Scaife [1853?-1929], until October 5, 1929; Estate of Lois E. Scaife, Pittsburgh [1]; bequest to Museum, 1929. 
NOTES:1. Peoples-Pittsburgh Trust Company was acting as executor to Lois E. Scaife's estate, and this work was transferred from her home to the offices of Peoples-Pittsburgh Trust Company, where it was then transferred to the Museum.
